author: Special Correspondent
text:
City Corporation Commissioner M. Seeni Ajmalkhan on Wednesday appeared in the court of First Additional District Munsif Court responding to a warrant in connection with a civil dispute pertaining to name transfer between a couple that was dealt as per due procedure by the office of the Commissioner during 2012-13.

Summons

The Commissioner who had taken charge only a week back was reportedly not aware of the summons served earlier by the court for the duration when the seat was vacant.

But, since the issuance of summons had been deemed to have been acknowledged by the City Corporation on the basis of a signature of some employee, which, sources said, appeared to be fake. The unresponsiveness of the Commissioner was made out to be that of wilful disobedience.

The Commissioner submitted the documents to judge Sivasakthivel Kannan, sources said.
title: Erode Commissioner appears in court
